# How to become your own best collaborator

## Setting up the project

## Important steps
1. Install R and R Studio if you have not done this previously.
2. Get a GitHub account
3. Set up a new Github repo
4. Create a new Rmarkdown project
5. Create your first R markdown file
6. Edit the documment 
7. Save & commit to Github
8.

source("./getwd.R")

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
